price: Guyyaa samii marru akka mariinsa barreessan xalayaalee (galmeewwan) marutti [yaadadhu]. Akkuma uumaa duraa jalqabnetti isa deebifna. (Kun) waadaa Nu irra jiruudha. Dhugumatti, Nuti raawwattoota taanee jirra.
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَطۡوِي ٱلسَّمَآءَ كَطَيِّ ٱلسِّجِلِّ لِلۡكُتُبِۚ كَمَا بَدَأۡنَآ أَوَّلَ خَلۡقٖ نُّعِيدُهُۥۚ وَعۡدًا عَلَيۡنَآۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا فَٰعِلِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: yawma naṭwī al-samāa kaṭayyi al-sijili lil'kutubi kamā badanā awwala khalqin nuʿīduhu waʿdan ʿalaynā innā kunnā fāʿilīna
